ingredients.content: 2 lemons, peeled, white pith and pips removed and cut into halves

preparations.content: Place sugar, ice cubes, mint and lemons into mixing bowl and crush <b>30 sec/speed 6<b>-10, increasing speed gradually<b>.
Add 1000 g water and mix <b>20 sec/speed 6<b>-10, increasing speed gradually<b>. Serve immediately.
